statements: DELETE FROM perishable_goods WHERE id = 1 AND temperature < 10
DELETE FROM perishable_goods WHERE condition = 'Fragile' AND transportation_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM PerishableGoods WHERE transport_id = 200 AND temperature_threshold < 5;
DELETE FROM goods WHERE perishable = TRUE;
DELETE FROM temperature_readings WHERE temperature_id = 1000 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM goods WHERE perishable = TRUE OR storage_temperature > 10.5;
DELETE FROM transportation WHERE destination = 'Warehouse B' AND start_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM perishable_goods WHERE goods_id IN (SELECT goods_id FROM shipment_details WHERE destination = 'New York');
